top_categories.workout_context: 6,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Crooked Gravel's Mountain gravel, High altitude forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 62 miles.
97ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Crooked Gravel's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before August.
At Crooked Gravel, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Crooked Gravel. Train it until it feels boring.
6,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Crooked Gravel, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Base fitness for Crooked Gravel. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
62 miles on Colorado mountain gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Low-cadence force work for 6,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on Colorado mountain gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Crooked Gravel’s 62 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Crooked Gravel with 6,000ft of climbing, much of it above 8,000ft demands altitude preparation. Arrive 5–7 days early for acclimatization. Expect 5–15% power reduction at altitude. Increase iron intake 4 weeks out. Hydrate aggressively — altitude increases fluid loss by 20–40%. High altitude (8000-10000+ feet); Sun exposure at altitude.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Crooked Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on colorado mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: mountain gravel, high altitude, significant climbing.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on VO2max, Gravel Specific, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 62 miles of colorado mountain gravel in Winter Park, Colorado.
